Key Match Events: Sri Lanka scored 230 for eight thanks to half-centuries from Nissanka and Wellalage
India fell short in their chase, losing by one run despite Rohit Sharma's 58
Charith Asalanka took three wickets for 30 runs
Wanindu Hasaranga took three wickets for 58 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a tricky pitch that offered considerable assistance to the spinners
Others: The second ODI is scheduled for August 4, 2024, in Colombo
